Step Forward
From The Challenge: A great opportunity
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Want to make the wise decision about your future?
As an NCS Graduate, you recently received an email about Step Forward, a London based programme which provides school and college leavers with a chance to spend a year in the world of work with a top quality employer.
As a Step Forward Associate, you’ll get invaluable experience, fantastic training and a qualification - all whilst benefiting from the help and advice of an experienced mentor.
Get paid to do real work for a high quality employer, make new friends and develop the skills you’ll need to get ahead in life.
We wanted to remind you about this great opportunity and encourage you to apply before 12th October for your chance to be part of an exciting school leavers’ programme!
How do I apply?
Step Forward is a competitive programme and places are limited. To be considered for our next assessment event in October half term, the deadline for submitting applications is Sunday 12th October. Apply with your unique application form Here.
Best wishes,
WWW.STEPFORWARD.UK.COM /thestepforward
